body: Hey, I was wondering if anyone from the community that is good at making texture packs for me, Could make me my own custom one if not does anyone know any good ones that are for basic PvP not like Kohi or badlion
body_tagged: Hey, I was wondering if anyone from the community that is good at making texture packs for me, Could make me my own custom one if not does anyone know any good ones that are for basic PvP not like Kohi or badlion
title: Texture Pack

replies.body:
There's already many good texture packs, you could probably find one that you like. Check out 'texture pack folder' youtube videos / ocn's centralized list of resource packs, although it's outdated.

For example here's texture pack folder video of ginie1, badlion admin and famous ocn guy.
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=q1oz7coKXYs
